title: When you're playing Support and your ADC keeps pushing when you say not to...
body:
... and you think the enemy jungler is going to gank you and your ward just died
http://rack.0.mshcdn.com/media/ZgkyMDEzLzA2LzE4L2I2L0pvaG5ueURlcHBwLmM1YjNkLmdpZgpwCXRodW1iCTEyMDB4OTYwMD4/70417de1/fe5/Johnny-Depp-panics.gif

... And then your ADC Jinx decides to tower dive at half HP level 5 without telling you, just as the enemy jungle shows up behind you
https://38.media.tumblr.com/a1ccd003ef0dc89fdac7bc40d69c284c/tumblr_ndiaaoZShw1qg53kdo1_500.gif

... And then they kill your ADC and you don't know if you should run for the hills or suicide to secure the kill on Tristana
http://media.tumblr.com/091a614e4b1bada7f5b752673b3de6f1/tumblr_inline_neuhceAKhR1s3m0er.gif

... and after you narrowly escape death enemy midlane walks into the bush you're recalling in
http://33.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lpu4tiyNmh1qbvovho1_500.gif

... and then you run like the dickens
http://24.media.tumblr.com/f2e3ebc9182b30419e96ec82dfa47ecd/tumblr_mnbe6vDNkp1r9vlpqo1_400.gif

... And then you survive all this
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--pS9QBNl4mI/VBlkRrR7QiI/AAAAAAAACAY/In8lHQPX_G4/s1600/firework-2.gif

... And then your ADC goes "GG Blitzcrank is retard" when she respawns
http://popmitzvah.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/tumblr_mtxcevs3yt1rnm1ldo1_500.gif

... and then when you decide to become the ADC because it's better than supporting someone as bad as her and she asks wtf you're doing
http://i.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/emma-roberts-surprise-bitch.gif

... and then you win the game, carrying the team as Blitzcrank, and Jinx says she's going to report you
http://i2.photobucket.com/albums/y23/BruceTheBunny/GIFS/tumblr_m7tsgbe8wl1rpam43.gif

replies.body: Wild ride, start to finish.
20/10 ver inspiring story would read again
What do I do if I play as {{champion:44}} against a {{champion:53}} with a {{champion:110}} who can't do anything and a {{champion:429}} who keeps getting farm?

You cry

You retreat under your tower, hug your gems, and cry
That reply was truly outrageous {{champion:44}}

You're taric. You literaly body block ur adc and when u get pulled u giga smash them and say "Surprise, I'm AP". 1shot gg.
And when you say he's just farming, then keep on body blocking(if you see a potential pull).
I main Varus adc, he's either rlly stupid or a afraid and wants to make it to late game.
except ap taric just doesn't work quite as well as used to be back before they changed the scaling of w
420/10 happens all the time
IGN- 9.8\10 ~Literally unplayable.
IGN 7.8/ 10 Too much water in the river
Too salty
i would just say "fuck you im going top, cho will treat me right"

Dat Karma?

Dat Karma.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y2DMWMlRZ0Y

SO PAINFUL!!!

D:

pretty funny, 100% accurate until blitzcrank was involved... for me its leona. i hate when i am peeling as leona and the adc derps and thinks that means go back in with 1/4th health

no, it means run the fuck away, there are 3 people in the botlane i am just peeling because i can take the beating for you.

This makes me nostalgic over my many Sona matches. I never stole a kill...I earned them all.

I really ought to save up the IP and buy her.

O ya this also reminds me of the passive cc farming only asshole adcs. Who sit there farming. When u already have poked down both the enemy support and adc down below 1/3 hp and they wont fucking engage EVER. Even though they are full hp have out built them and have their summoner spells up. This pisses me off to no end. Those kind of players need to be fined 20$ to their credit card. Reason: Enemy assist by not engaging
110/10 great story.
12/10 great story plus rice.

lol.

Good read. Seems like something that would come out of GD though.
GJ meng
This happens to me 4/10 games if I do blind pick normals lol.
the second and third pics cracked me up. Thank you for making this its to funny
for me its supports with shields when I shield you that does not mean go into the 5 people all wanting to kill you
